caption.p: Thrombolytic activity of ethanol extract of M. longipes root and Q. gomeziana leaves. Values are expressed as mean ± SEM (n = 3); *** p < 0.001 and ** p < 0.01 are statistically significant comparison with control followed by Dunnett’s test. SK = Streptokinase; EEMLR = Ethanol extract of M. longipes root; EEQGL = Ethanol extract of Q. gomeziana leaves .
